snippet: Steve Appleton was chief executive for 18 years and built an executive team with deep experience working together. Micron's main business of memory chips is poised for an upswing, too, which could help smooth disruptions.
abstract: Steve Appleton was chief executive for 18 years and built an executive team with deep experience working together. Micron's main business of memory chips is poised for an upswing, too, which could help smooth disruptions.
lead_paragraph: The untimely death on Friday of Steve Appleton, chairman and chief executive of Micron Technology, comes at a time when his company is well-prepared to endure shocks to the system.

headline.main: Micron Chief Leaves Behind a Stable Company
